entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
